name: Super Gilli Danda
description:
Pakistani Gilli Danda Players invite international baseball players to compete against them in a tarditional game of Gilli Danda.

How To Play: 

Press J button to stop the moving  cursor on where you want to Hit the gilli.

Try to avoid the Red area to miss hitting the gilli

When hit in the green the gilli will be sent flying upward relatively 

Try to move the circle with WASD shown below to hit  the flying gilli before it lands with J button inside the Square

The Gilli will be sent flying depending on where you hit it

Try to hit the gilli as far as possible to gain maximum score in without missing for 3 turns and getting caught 

Enjoy!
